body_html:
@joel-shor Oh. You can change 'W' to 'W2' and move it outside of the scope, it still throws error. I'm only trying to point out that EMA cannot work inside reuse=True.
By the way I don't think I'm calling EMA on the same tensors, because calling add twice creates two tf.Operation.
body_text:
@joel-shor Oh. You can change 'W' to 'W2' and move it outside of the scope, it still throws error. I'm only trying to point out that EMA cannot work inside reuse=True.
By the way I don't think I'm calling EMA on the same tensors, because calling add twice creates two tf.Operation.
body:
@joel-shor Oh. You can change 'W' to 'W2' and move it outside of the scope, it still throws error. I'm only trying to point out that EMA cannot work inside reuse=True. 
By the way I don't think I'm calling EMA on the same tensors, because calling `add` twice creates two `tf.Operation`.
